title: Sceptre of Torment
data:
{{version031}} {{flavour|An accursed golden sceptre, created by some unknown hellish power. When used in combat, it causes agonising pain in all those unfortunate enough to gaze upon it, save for the wielder.}} [[File:Sceptre of torment.png]] '''''the +7 sceptre of Torment''''' +7 [[eveningstar]] [[Pain brand]]
Casts [[Symbol of Torment]] on 20% of successful attacks - the wielder is immune to these torments
[[Evil]] ==Desirability== The '''sceptre of Torment'''{{source ref|0.31.0|art-data.txt|311}} is an excellent weapon for those invested in [[Necromancy]] that can take full advantage of the [[pain brand]]. Even with no Necromancy skill, a +7 eveningstar is still a respectable one-handed weapon for a [[Maces & Flails]] user. Its auto-torment effect is very useful in a standard 3-rune game, but becomes significantly less helpful in late-game areas where most monsters are immune to torment like the [[Tomb]], the [[Hells]], the [[Abyss]], and [[Pandemonium]]. ==References== ==History== *Prior to [[0.23]], the sceptre of Torment had a [[staff]] as its base type, did not have the [[pain]] brand, triggered torment on 50% of its attacks, and did not protect the wielder from its torment. *Prior to [[0.20]], the sceptre of Torment also had a very small chance of activating each turn when you weren't attacking with it. *Prior to [[0.17]], the sceptre of Torment had a [[mace]] as its base type. *Prior to [[0.15]], the Sceptre of Torment was a +7, +6 weapon.
